title: The Queen's Snare
description: From best selling mystery author Traci Tyne Hilton comes The Queen's Snare, the first novel in The Tangle Saga series.One woman, heir to a throne back on Earth, found life on a remote space station a comfortable way to avoid responsibilities waiting back on her home planet.But when her rebellious teenaged brother and sister disappear her responsibilities catch up with her.Thousands of lives hang in the balance--including her own--as she digs into the darkest corners in space. Can she find the missing kids before their rebellion sets off a chain of violence no one can stop?
author: Traci Tyne Hilton
